website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot A3300 IS offers up nice features and excellent photos while staying simple and affordable.
pros: The Canon PowerShot A3300 IS has a nice feature set for the money as well as excellent photo quality
cons: The camera has long shot-to-shot times and its flat buttons can be tricky to press

customer_reviews.title: with the focus and exposure usually perfect while in fully auto mode
customer_reviews.text: I have taken over 15,000 photos with this camera over the past 4-years, dropped it onto concrete from a height of over 4-feet (small dent in corner), and still using the original battery (along with an additional replacement battery). I use it mainly for documentation at work. Shooting is a little slow, but it takes decent photos, with the focus and exposure usually perfect while in fully auto mode. This camera is still going strong, but decided that it can't last forever so I am now replacing with the Elph 340 HS. Considered buying another A3300 because of its reliability but it is a pretty old model now and is the same price as the newer 340.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, wayyyyy under the radar
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot more to these cameras that most people realize. Has full auto mode and a manual mode for more specific operation. Great quality! I purchased it for commercial footage in a tight spot (small mount in a tree) and ran it for a time lapse sequence that very easily fit in into a full 1080p production (still footage at even 12mp is more than 2k in video). Camera is light, battery lasts 1.25 hours running photos every 5 seconds, does not draw attention like a DSLR or larger camcorder.
customer_reviews.author: Movielighter

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Canon camera, great quality and lasts forever (unless you drop it off an enbankment)
customer_reviews.author: Canyon country

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price. I got mine for 80 dollars with shipping. Seems to be handy when you don't want to bring along a bigger camera. The main drawback with the camera seems to be not enough zoom capability. I am still getting used to this limitation. Also found that it doesn't seem to have the ability to stitch pics together like my larger Kodak camera can.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Canon A3300
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because my son bought one and said it was good. It is GOOD! You can review your shots without getting the lens to pop out. Bought a Canon wireless all in one, too. Together, they make a great pair. GREAT pictures! I'm no professional, but I can see the quality. Focuses for you, balances light. Zoom doesn't distort picture and blurr it. Does a good job at taking everyday pictures. Some professionals even like it.
customer_reviews.author: Same Old Same Old

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to cameras and bought this based off of past experiences with Canon and reviews. So far I like it a lot. The picture quality is what I expected for the price, the time in between pictures is a bit long sometimes (2 seconds roughly) and it's not great at motion shots. It does take some beautiful pictures though and I think anyone would be happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: used Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: I rcvd the camera in good time, it came with a battery and a battery charger. I bought a memory card for it at a local store. I just went to Canon's site to pull the instruction manual and I am set. The camera is in working condition, no problems at all. I don't think I will be purchasing brand new cameras any longer - the price for this was very good, I saved money and I have a great camera now.
customer_reviews.author: TBeggs

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: - It is light, beautiful and easy to use. The quality of picture is good. When I choose Auto mode, the average quality of picture is approximately 5 MB, it is awsome. The black color makes it stronger. I love this camera. I strongly recommed everyone to buy this camera. But it cannot take photos at night. The taken picture at night is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Phan Anh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes the greatest photos, just as good as any expensive camera out there, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: EnEboni

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun and function little camera that was purchased for my daughter. She had a nice professional camera but uses this one more because of the size and quality of photos she gets from it. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: tinalea

customer_reviews.title: Lot of Camera with many features for very little investment!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera for the Price! Many features like electronic Zoom lens, Auto focus, face recognition and many more! And OH! did I mention 16 MP! Enlarges shot to large sizes with super high resolution! Super Buy!
customer_reviews.author: St. Byron

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, tricky flash settings.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for about a year now, I love it. Takes great photos, and has plenty of settings to chose from. The only issue I have is which setting allows me to have the flash on at all times, which there is one. Sometimes the shutter time is slower than I'd like as well.
customer_reviews.author: abartinc

customer_reviews.title: Used for Business
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I own a real estate appraisal business and use this camera as our primary tool for taking house pictures. It has been used daily for months and we have taken thousands of photos with it. Works great. Never misses a shot. It is very easy to use but gives tons of options. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Fritopunk

customer_reviews.title: Nice features
customer_reviews.text: I have always enjoyed the Canon color processing, and this camera did not disappoint. Great color, very compact size, and many features make this a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ross C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great! I gave it to my husband for his 25th birthday! He loves it & takes it everywhere with him. It is a great camera, especially for the low cost! We're very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other negative reviewers, this camera is a pain to use when it has to focus and the length of time it takes to finally shoot. For the price it can probably satisfy more patient persons.....
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Alkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as gift..he is very happy with this camera..for the price it is an excellent buy. He takes many photos, I think, thou, he said its recovery period between shots is a little too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie1170

customer_reviews.title: Great camera...Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera because it gets the job done, and it's so compact that it's easy to carry in a pocket. It takes great pictures, especially outside. Indoor picture quality isn't that great which is why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5. I think it is worth the price though!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For that new grad or student traveler a good starter camera
customer_reviews.author: larryc

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: It was a good camera, it had a lens error in less than a month though, I had only taken it out of my camera case, turned it on, and it malfunctioned. Not the seller's fault though! And they refunded my money for it fully and were easy to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this camera. The pictures it takes are wonderful. Easy to use and all at a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Anthony Mozzo
customer_reviews.text: I give this camera a excellent rating, easy to use and the picture qulity is great. the rechargeable battery charge last a reasonable time even when recording video.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P. Mozzo

customer_reviews.title: Best for its price
customer_reviews.text: All the cameras that I bought in the past had serious problem of taking pictures in the night. This is relatively better and cheap. It is easy to use and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyLobster

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures in various lighting conditions. The battery lasts well and recharges quickly. Flash is powerful enough for most conditions.
customer_reviews.author: deadline

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, thin built, easy to carry in my pocket. Only wish the Zoom button would be easier to operate. Over all, Canon is a trusted brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: After days of searching for a replacement for my Kodak 12MP, I thought this was the perfect one. I assumed that 16MP would give me amazing pictures... BIG disappointment. My friend has a Canon 14MP Powershot and that one does take better pictures. After reading all the features this camera had, I decided to order 2, one for me and the other one as a gift. BIG mistake, the material is very cheap (plastic). As soon as I opened the box and felt the material, I immediately printed out a return label. It looks and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera and had no problems with it. I took some great pictures on my trip to Hoover Dam. I also like the different shooting modes.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for great price
customer_reviews.text: Good Camera for great price. Nice to have for taking Casual pictures at home, outdoors etc... I would like to recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Red Devil

customer_reviews.title: Prasenjit
customer_reviews.text: decent purchase..look wise not that great but take good snaps.also, video recording comes a bit blurry.It can be recommended with this price..
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit Ghosh

customer_reviews.title: camera for work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the price for where I work. We needed to upgrade. Very easy to use. But still not see the stability feature for this. Great camera for the price with the amount of Pixels.
customer_reviews.author: 456par

customer_reviews.title: The Camera H Served Me Well
customer_reviews.text: We've been all over the world with this camera and I've had no problems using it. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: David Schechter

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Good, Delivery on time, As good as mentioned..!!! Camera is working fine, it been 2 months i have been using it..No problem till now
customer_reviews.author: Jibran

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: nice camera and good brand plus quality brand and i will be all the time and purchasing from this website
customer_reviews.author: Mazouz Sahm

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good product and very usefull procudt for me.I am always looking for this kind of new product which is usefull in day by day use.
customer_reviews.author: SumankPanchal

customer_reviews.title: It deserves no stars
customer_reviews.text: I collect cameras and have been a photographer for 30 years(check out my other reviews). Canon should be embarrassed with this piece of plastic garbage! The sensor gives a gritty image(too many megapixels) the lens has trouble giving a uniform image because the plastic fragile zoom mechanism can,t stay straight when zooming and in my case, it broke right off its track and now can't focus. You will see a ton of these on ebay with the same problem. Avoid this Camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Capobianco

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: Have had the chance to use this camera for a month and have been impressed by the improvements in Canon's controls, stability and zoom functions. For a camera this inexpensive it accomplishes most every shot that I need. My only complaints about speed and image clarity are issues common to lower cost camera. Not big enough issues to prevent me from using this camera and enjoying on most trips. This camera is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera. There are so many options, bells and whistles. I love the optical zoom and the ability to correct or manuver the shot. This camera is easy to use and has many, many functions. Still trying to learn them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot A3300 16 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackCanon PowerShot A3300 IS 16.0 MP Digital Still Camera with 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (Black)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

Loaded with Features, Packed with Value.
Easy to use, powerful A-Series camera has 16.0 Megapixels with a 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (28mm wide) and Optical Image Stabilizer for capturing great images in a snap!


With the PowerShot A3300 IS digital camera, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 16.0 Megapixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The high-resolution images taken by the PowerShot A3300 IS can be enlarged up to 13" x 19". The PowerShot A3300 IS has a 5x wide Optical Zoom lens (35mm film equivalent: 28–140mm) that let you capture up-close and memorable images.


16.0 Megapixel Resolution
In Still Images or 720p HD Video, Every Detail is Beautifully Preserved.
Capture memories your way as either still images or in 720p HD video.
PowerShot A3300 IS digital camera puts you in charge when it comes to saving your memories. Canon technology lets you capture beautiful still images no matter what your level of photographic experience. Portraits of people posing or in motion, outdoor shots in various weather situations, nighttime shooting and more: the camera handles them all with ease when you shoot in Smart AUTO. High megapixel counts let you blow up and crop your still images just as you please, with no loss in resolution or quality.
Want to capture the good times in motion? Canon’s 720p HD video gives your memories the quality they deserve. If you’ve never shot video in high definition before, you’ll be amazed at the difference it makes. 720p HD delivers stunning realism, capturing every detail with a level of clarity that, in playback, will bring you right back into the moment. Easy high definition videos from a compact still camera – now that’s value!




See the Image On a Big Screen.
Large, clear 3.0-inch LCD makes taking and viewing images a breeze.
The PowerShot A3300 IS's large 3.0-inch LCD screen gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light.





3.0-inch LCD Screen
Everything’s Easy.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on 32 predefined shooting situations.
Just set the Canon PowerShot A3300 IS digital camera to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture-taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 32 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images.




Smart AUTO
The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.





P Program
Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.





Live View Control
Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls.





Easy
Keep the image quality as high as possible for fail-proof images. 





Portrait
The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.”





Landscape
For front to back sharpness, the camera sets a small aperture.





Kids & Pets
Reduced focusing time freezes fast-moving subjects, so you won’t miss those special shots.





Smart Shutter
The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.





Low Light
For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations.





Beach
Get clear shots of people at a sunny beach without darkened faces.





Foliage
Capture brilliant shots of autumn foliage, greenery and blossoms.





Snow
Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.





Fireworks
Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.





Long Shutter
Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography.





Creative Filters
The Creative Filters mode dial setting provides easy access to special filter effect and scene modes.





Fisheye Effect
Add a classic photo distortion without a fisheye lens.





Miniature Effect
Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image.





Toy Camera Effect
Simulates photos taken with “toy” or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.





Monochrome
Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.





Super Vivid
Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.





Poster Effect
Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.





Discreet Mode
Disables flash, AF assist beam, and all camera sounds with one mode dial setting.





Movie
Shoot in HD (1280 x 720) at 30 fps for up to 22 min. and 05 sec. or 4GB per clip. Shoot in VGA (640 x 480) at 30 fps or for up to 50 min. and 17 sec. or 4GB per clip and QVGA (320 x 240) at 30 fps for up to 3 hour 2 min. and 52sec. or 4GB per clip.


Actual results may vary from examples shown above.
Final image may vary depending on picture composition. 
Shoot without Distractions.
New scene mode: Discreet Mode disables the sound, flash and AF beam so you can capture images in quiet areas.
How many times have you found yourself in a situation where you wanted to take a picture, but were reluctant (or simply not allowed) to disrupt the setting with noise or flash? New Discreet Mode makes picture-taking possible in museums, at performances, anywhere light and sound would not be welcome. Simply turn the mode dial to Discreet, and the camera’s sound, flash and AF assist beam will be disabled – without changing any other settings. If the camera senses low light, ISO speed will be automatically raised to get the best possible shot. You can even switch to playback mode to review still images or video, and the camera will remain muted.




Photographic Artistry That’s Easy for Anyone.
Creative Filters offers fun and artistic ways to capture photos.
Creative Filters Mode gives you lots of fun, easy ways to make your photography more creative. The camera does all the work – you simply choose an effect and shoot!


Fisheye Effect imparts a fun, familiar curvilinear distortion to your image that’s ideal for kids and pets. Miniature Effect plays with perspective, giving any shot the look of a world created in much smaller proportions – great for landscapes and city shots. When you shoot in Toy Camera Effect, you get the vintage effect of a first-generation camera, ideal for giving portraits a slightly distorted, unevenly saturated look of a picture you’d come across in your attic. Monochrome lends a moody beauty to your photography, producing shots in Black & White, Sepia or Blue. Super Vivid saturates colors to heighten the intensity and impact of any shot. Poster Effect takes away transitions between objects in the frame to give your image the high-impact look of a hand-painted poster.




Charge Up and Go!
Lithium-ion offers an easy alternative to recharge the battery.
Creative Filters Mode gives you lots of fun, easy ways to make your photography more creative. The camera does all the work – you simply choose an effect and shoot!


The Canon PowerShot A3300 IS digital camera uses a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it a lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A3300 IS will be ready and waiting for those special moments.




A Bold Pop of Color.
Comes in 5 cool, crisp colors to match any personality: Red, Black, Blue, Silver and Pink.
Creative Filters Mode gives you lots of fun, easy ways to make your photography more creative. The camera does all the work – you simply choose an effect and shoot!


There's nobody else quite like you. So naturally, you demand a camera that is utterly you...like the Canon PowerShot A3300 IS. This camera makes getting what you want remarkably easy. Exquisitely compact, its design has smoothly curving edges. And it comes in five distinctive colors that let you tell the world who you really are. Express yourself as quietly or as boldly as you like. Simply take your pick from the stylish range of shades. There's a choice of Red, Black, Blue, Silver and Pink. Every color tells its own story and each creates a wonderful impression of you.
feature_bullets: 16.0 effective megapixels, 1/2.3-inch CCD image sensor; 5x wide angle optical zoom and 4x digital zoom
3.0 in. TFT LCD display with wide angle viewing; Built-in flash; 720p HD video recording
Optical Image Stabilizer; DIGIC 4 Image Processor; Discreet Mode; Creative Filters
Smart AUTO (32 scenes); Face Detection; Red-eye correction
USB 2.0 Hi-Speed; SD card slot (card not included)
16.0 megapixels, with a 5x wide-angle optical zoom (28mm wide) with optical image stabilizer
Smart Auto intelligently selects settings from 32 predefined shooting situations
Discreet Mode disables the sound, flash and AF beam for use in quiet areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars52 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
